      public java.lang.String[] chooseCards​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> allCards)

    • getEndPositionOfFiveCards

      public int getEndPositionOfFiveCards​(java.lang.String[] elements, java.lang.String startDirection, int currentPosition, java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> wallsOnMap)
      takes five cards that affect position and direction and combines them to a final position
      Parameters:
      elements - the cards to combine into positions
      startDirection - the start direction to calculate from
      currentPosition - the start position to calculate from
      wallsOnMap - all walls on map
      Returns:
      endPosition -1 if it is an impossible path, otherwise return the end position
